reauth_confirm.description: The Google Calendar integration needs to re-authenticate your account

abort.code_expired: Authentication code expired or credential setup is invalid, please try again.
abort.api_disabled: You must enable the Google Calendar API in the Google Cloud Console

progress.exchange:
To link your Google account, visit the [{url}]({url}) and enter code:

{user_code}

data.calendar_access: Home Assistant access to Google Calendar

application_credentials.description:
Follow the [instructions]({more_info_url}) for [OAuth consent screen]({oauth_consent_url}) to give Home Assistant access to your Google Calendar. You also need to create Application Credentials linked to your Calendar:
1. Go to [Credentials]({oauth_creds_url}) and click **Create Credentials**.
1. From the drop-down list select **OAuth client ID**.
1. Select **TV and Limited Input devices** for the Application Type.
